issue.title: [C++] Configuration error with Anaconda Python 3.7.4
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6223](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6223). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```Java

CMake Error at cmake_modules/FindPythonLibsNew.cmake:127 (message):
  Python config failure: Python is 0-bit, chosen compiler is 64-bit
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  src/arrow/python/CMakeLists.txt:22 (find_package)

```
